New Records: Pakistan successfully chased the highest target (345) in an ODI World Cup match
Mohammad Rizwan scored 131* (121 balls) and Abdullah Shafique scored 113 (103 balls), both setting new records
Key Match Events: Pivotal partnership between Rizwan and Shafique worth 176 runs in 156 balls
Sri Lanka's centuries by Kusal Mendis (122) and Sadeera Samarawickrama (108) in response
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Hyderabad, where the crowd showed strong support for Pakistan
Pakistan's victory marked their second win in the World Cup
Others: The article briefly mentions other matches but focuses primarily on Pakistan vs Sri Lanka
